LanguageData.VBE_Kombucha.label: kombucha tea
LanguageData.VBE_Kombucha.description: A sugary tea left out to ferment, after fermenting the end product is a sweet and sour, sometimes even naturally fizzy drink known as kombucha. Praised for health benefits, though some remain skeptical. Kombucha acts as a home remedy against the flu, reducing its severity by 5%.
